T02D2389:21a-1: n'a da bindhu dv'a re yo gi ni tsarya n'a ma /
T02D2389:21a-3: rtsa rlung gi sgo nas rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2389:21a-4: yum bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2389:21a-5: bdag ni mdog sdug 'phyon ma min //
T02D2389:21a-6: dbyibs legs 'phyon ma'ang ma yin te //
T02D2389:21a-7: dgyes rdor spyod pa'i dge spyang gis //
T02D2389:21a-8: de ni bdag gi bdag por 'gyur //
T02D2389:21a-9: bdag ni mtshams su phung par 'gyur //
T02D2389:21a-10: bhandha pa yis mtshams su bcom //
T02D2389:21a-11: de ni bdag gis ji ltar bya //
T02D2389:21a-12: phyogs bzhir bltas na thar ba med //
T02D2389:21a-13: thams cad bltas pas nam mkha'i dbyings //
T02D2389:21a-14: bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur //
T02D2389:21a-15: bhandha ba yis mtshams su bcom //
T02D2389:21a-16: da ni stong pa'i de nyid rtogs //
T02D2389:21a-17: smros dang sems khyod ci rtogs na //
T02D2389:21a-18: de ngor gzhan cig 'gro bar byed //
T02D2389:21a-19: bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur //
T02D2389:21a-20: bhandha pa yis mtshams su bcom //
T02D2389:21a-21: da ni dur khrod dgon pa ru //
T02D2389:21a-22: de ru bdag ni gnas par byed //
T02D2389:21a-23: ri spyod pa yi gnas dag tu //
T02D2389:21a-24: skye rga'i rgyun ni bcad nas gnas //
T02D2389:21a-25: bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur //
T02D2389:21a-26: bhandha pa yis mtshams su bcom //
T02D2389:21a-27: bhandha mkhas pa chen po des //
T02D2389:21a-28: sna tshogs sems ni gar byed pa //
T02D2389:21a-29: de yi rang bzhin dbang du 'dus //
T02D2389:21a-30: bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur //
T02D2389:21a-31: bhandha pa yis mtshams su bcom //
T02D2389:21a-32: rtsa rlung gi sgo nas rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa
